column4: I was fiddling with an external WD Hard drive trying to set up the partitions to use it as a boot up and i ended up boogering it all up
It wont even recognize now, when i try to reformat it under qt partition it just kinda does nothing
Anyone give me a hand getting it back to a usebale state?
I have a hobby of tinkering with things under the influence of alcohol ;)
yeah i've been trying for about the past 45 minutes and im making no progress
